entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
